title: Dales for Sale
overview: The Yorkshire Dales is one of the UK's hottest property markets… and finding families a stone built cottage in an idyllic village means long days for property guru Marcus Alderson and his sales team.Now Really is joining Britain's most entertaining estate agents in the office and on the road dealing in dream homes set in the stunning North Yorkshire landscape…There'll be stunning renovations, new builds in gorgeous places and drama as sellers race to secure a sale and buyers rush to find a piece of heaven in the hills.Our stars are Marcus and his agents – Carla, Richard, Rosie and Sue – and their clients, drawn to dales that are more familiar to most as holiday destinations… with amazing aerial photography, big characters and dreams coming true, Dales for Sale is unmissable viewing.
